toolCards.name: Tool Card 1
toolCards.description: After drafting, increase or decrease the value of the drafted die by 1

toolCards.name: Tool Card 2
toolCards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the color restrictions

toolCards.name: Tool Card 3
toolCards.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the value restrictions

toolCards.name: Tool Card 4
toolCards.description: Move exactly two dice, obeying all placement restrictions

toolCards.name: Tool Card 5
toolCards.description: After drafting, swap the drafted die with a die from the Round Track

toolCards.name: Tool Card 6
toolCards.description: After drafting re-roll the drafted die

toolCards.name: Tool Card 7
toolCards.description: Re-roll all dice in the Draft Pool

toolCards.name: Tool Card 8
toolCards.description: After your first turn, immediately draft a die

toolCards.name: Tool Card 9
toolCards.description: After drafting, place the die in a spot that is not adjacent to another one

toolCards.name: Tool Card 10
toolCards.description: After drafting, flip the die to its opposite side

toolCards.name: Tool Card 11
toolCards.description: After drafting, return the die to the Dice Bag and pull 1 die from the bag

toolCards.name: Tool Card 12
toolCards.description: Move up to two dice of the same color that match the color of a die on the Round Track
